Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Guinta to the Rules amendment (A001).

Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: At the end of subtitle D of title I of division A, add the following:    SEC. 1431. GOVERNMENT ACCOUNTABILITY OFFICE STUDY ON COST OF COMPLIANCE.    Not later than 90 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Comptroller General of the United States shall submit to Congress a report that describes the cost to the Federal Highway Administration of compliance with Federal statutes and regulations as a percentage of the overall spending by such Administration.
